discription: Configurations available in 28.8kWh to 1.5MWh systems (Utility Scale systems available on request).The PowerLord Battery Storage System does NOT employ Lithium. The PowerLord Battery is a safe (non flammable), high density, durable storage system that does not require external cooling. The PowerLord battery will NOT ignite if punctured or damaged. The The PowerLord Battery can be transported from the source and used anywhere, indoors or out.

PPES Battery Storage is like Money in the Bank, There when you need it. All Plug and Play battery storage, inverters, smart meters and related hardware are MADE IN THE USA, Canada or the EU. We avoid, whenever possible, any products of any kind whatsoevery, that are made in China. PowerLord™ micro-grid can operate in either a grid-connected mode to enable energy transactions with the main electrical grid or an islanded (standalone) mode if there is a fault in the main grid.
